item.title: Chloe add a quote by Juliet Marillier
item.description: "<i>So you do believe in... true love?</i> she whispered. I took a deep breath, <i>I think I have to,</i> I said, blinking back tears. <i>Without it, we're all going nowhere.</i>" -- Juliet Marillier

item.title: Chloe add a quote by Lloyd Alexander
item.description: "Most of us are called on to perform tasks far beyond what we can do. Our capabilities seldom match our aspirations, and we are often woefully unprepared. To this extent, we are all Assistant Pig-Keepers at heart." -- Lloyd Alexander

item.title: Chloe add a quote by Lloyd Alexander
item.description: "Child, child, do you not see? For each of us comes a time when we must be more than what we are." -- Lloyd Alexander

item.title: Chloe add a quote by Lloyd Alexander
item.description: "Neither refuse to give help when it is needed,... nor refuse to accept it when it is offered." -- Lloyd Alexander

item.title: Chloe add a quote by Simon Pegg
item.description: "Being a geek is all about being honest about what you enjoy and not being afraid to demonstrate that affection. It means never having to play it cool about how much you like something. Itâ€™s basically a license to proudly emote on a somewhat childish level rather than behave like a supposed adult. Being a geek is extremely liberating." -- Simon Pegg

item.title: Chloe add a quote by Siegfried Sassoon
Chloe add a quote by John Green
item.description: "I was blind and heart broken and didn't want to do anything and Gus burst into my room and shouted, "I have wonderful news!" And I was like, "I don't really want to hear wonderful news right now," and Gus said, "This is wonderful news you want to hear," and I asked him, "Fine, what is it?" and he said, "You are going to live a good and long life filled with great and terrible moments that you cannot even imagine yet!" -- John Green

item.title: Chloe add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "Until this moment, I had not realized that someone could break your heart twice, along the very same fault lines." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Chloe add a quote by Steve Maraboli
item.description: "It is only with true love and compassion that we can begin to mend what is broken in the world. It is these two blessed things that can begin to heal all broken hearts." -- Steve Maraboli
